PARAGRAPH_DESCRIPTION: With a fresh and modern perspective, ready to face challenges with creativity and determination.

EXPERIENCES.DESCRIPTION: Continue with frontend development of the requests and help desk system. Also, currently developing a website for a travel agency (BiodiversoTravel).
Collaborated in the development of a governmental website using WordPress.
Designed a commercial directory, from sketches and mockups to interactivity in Figma. Focus on responsive design.

Developed the frontend of a requests system using vanilla JavaScript, JQuery, and Bootstrap. Also, completely created a web application for an internal help desk using Angular, Tailwind CSS, and SQLite.
